div.p: 84000 currently uses SmartCAT, a computer-assisted translation web tool for individual or collaborative translation. Computer-assisted translation software can be used to create and manage translation memories of terms and phrases, or even simple sentences, throughout one or a collection of translations. This can lead to more consistent terminology in translations and save time and effort by splitting the source text into segments and displaying them in-line with translation memories. CAT tool software also offers project management tools, advanced search functions, version control, and collaboration tools.

Once you have joined the 84000 account (see instructions below), you will have convenient access to 84000's glossary and translation memories in-line with your Tibetan text, even if you prefer to do your translation elsewhere.
div.h4: Join a Project on the 84000 Account
div.p: Suggested texts for the 2018 grant cycle are already uploaded to SmartCAT. You can email 84000smartCAT@gmail.com to request to join any project currently posted. You can also email a request for any other Kangyur text to be uploaded. See the tutorials below for details.
